definition: "Vereinzelt" is an adverb that describes something occurring or happening only occasionally or in isolated instances. It is commonly used to describe events, phenomena, or situations that happen infrequently or sporadically, emphasizing their rare occurrence.

examples.german: Es gibt vereinzelt noch freie Plätze.
examples.english: There are still a few available seats.
Snow showers are possible in isolated cases.

examples.german: Vereinzelt kommt es zu Verzögerungen im Zugverkehr.
examples.english: There are occasional delays in train traffic.
